Class ApplicationFormatter

java.lang.Object
utils.formatter.ApplicationFormatter
All Implemented Interfaces:
Formatter
public class ApplicationFormatter extends Object implements Formatter
Default implementation for application formatting. Provides flexible formatting options for displaying application details. Can be extended for different formatting styles.

    • formatAsRow

      public static String formatAsRow(Application application)
      Static utility method for formatting application as a single row for list display. Polymorphism via overloading - same name as InternshipFormatter.formatAsRow().
      Parameters:
      application - The application to format
      Returns:
      Formatted row string

    • formatDetails

      public static String formatDetails(Application application, String header, boolean showInternshipDetails)
      Static utility method for formatting application details with header
      Parameters:
      application - The application to format
      header - Optional header text (null for no header)
      showInternshipDetails - Whether to show detailed internship information
      Returns:
      Formatted details string

    • displayPaginatedTable

      public static boolean displayPaginatedTable(List<?> applications, String header, String emptyMsg, Function<Integer,String> detailGetter, Scanner sc, String border, int width)
      Display paginated table for applications (polymorphism via overloading - same name as InternshipFormatter).
      Parameters:
      applications - List of applications
      header - Table header
      emptyMsg - Empty message
      detailGetter - Function to get details
      sc - Scanner
      border - Border string
      width - Width
      Returns:
      true if go back requested

    • formatTableRowFromObject

      public static String[] formatTableRowFromObject(Object applicationObject, int displayNumber)
      Format application as a table row using reflection (MVC compliant). Returns array of cell values for TableView.
      Parameters:
      applicationObject - The application object to format
      displayNumber - The row number to display (1-based)
      Returns:
      Array of cell values

    • displayPaginatedTable

      public static boolean displayPaginatedTable(List<?> applications, String header, String emptyMsg, Function<Integer,String> detailGetter, Map<String, Consumer<Integer>> actions, Map<String,String> actionPrompts, Scanner sc, String border, int width)
      Display paginated table for applications with actions support.
      Parameters:
      applications - List of applications
      header - Table header
      emptyMsg - Empty message
      detailGetter - Function to get details
      actions - Map of action codes to action callbacks (e.g., 'A' -> accept, 'W' -> withdraw)
      actionPrompts - Map of action codes to action prompts (e.g., 'A' -> "accept", 'W' -> "withdraw")
      sc - Scanner
      border - Border string
      width - Width
      Returns:
      true if go back requested
